Dracona and Plintissa step out of the CR Chamber and walk to the War Room.
They sit in some chairs next to each other. Dracona takes out a nail file
and starts to file her nails. Plintissa waits for Ramhorn to come in.
Plintissa takes out some chips and starts to eat them. Dracona smiles and
starts to make her nail file make annoying sounds. Plintissa made annoying
crunching sounds, both of them together enough the make any bot go mad. They
waited for Ramhorn and Iron Raptor...
----- Original Message -----

>

to
